snippet: The boy suspected in the shooting at a middle school in Roswell was apprehended by a State Police lieutenant.
abstract: Police and witnesses say 12-year-old boy opened fire with shotgun at Berrendo Middle School in Roswell, NM, striking two among dozens of students gathered in a gym.
lead_paragraph: The boy suspected in the shooting at a middle school in Roswell was apprehended by a State Police lieutenant.

headline.main: 2 Injured in Shooting at New Mexico School
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: 2 Students Wounded In Shooting at Middle School
